installCommand: echo '*** USING vercel.json FROM REPO ROOT ***' && pwd && ls -la && node -v && npx -y pnpm@9.12.1 -v && HUSKY=0 npx -y pnpm@9.12.1 install --ignore-scripts
buildCommand: echo '*** BUILDING RADITAIL STORYBOOK VIA PNPM ***' && HUSKY=0 npx -y pnpm@9.12.1 --filter raditail run build-storybook
